1541480.name: Sucker Punch Demo
1541480.description:
Like Pong, in VR, on Steroids, with Superpowers! Sucker Punch VR is a fast-paced arcade punch-fest! Go head-to-head wielding a variety of powers, to punch, parry, and strike your way to victory! Score cubes past your opponent while preventing cubes from getting past you. Easy.....right?

Sucker Punch VR: Demo gives you free access to experience a taste of the action you can expect in the full Sucker Punch VR title!
1541480.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
